author: Depredates
notes: Easiest KoG ever, switching out Sphere Kuribohs for MVP ECON made it possible to win vs any deck because Fiend Farewell has a higher chance to dump your boss monsters plus econ lets you be way more offensive and makes you win when you feel like it's hopeless. It's the back row we truly needed!
main0: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
